name: CoverallsNet
help: Coveralls uploader for .Net Code coverage of your C# source code. Should work with any code files that get reported with the supported coverage tools, but the primary focus is CSharp.

properties.name: Output
properties.help: The coverage results json will be written to this file it provided.

properties.name: DryRun
properties.help: This flag will stop coverage results being posted to coveralls.io.

properties.name: UserRelativePaths
properties.help: This flag, when provided, will attempt to strip the current working directory from the beginning of the source file path.

properties.name: BasePath
properties.help: When useRelativePaths and a basePath is provided, this path is used instead of the current working directory.

properties.name: DynamicCodeCoverage
properties.help: Reads input as the CodeCoverage.exe xml format.

properties.name: ExportCodeCoverage
properties.help: Reads input as the Visual Studio Coverage Export xml format.

properties.name: Monocov
properties.help: Reads input as monocov results folder.

properties.name: RepoTokenVariable
properties.help: The Environment Variable name where the coveralls.io repository token is available. Default is <c>COVERALLS_REPO_TOKEN</c>.

properties.name: CommitId
properties.help: The git commit hash for the coverage report.

properties.name: CommitBranch
properties.help: The git branch for the coverage report.

properties.name: CommitAuthor
properties.help: The git commit author for the coverage report.

properties.name: CommitEmail
properties.help: The git commit author email for the coverage report.

properties.name: CommitMessage
properties.help: The git commit message for the coverage report.

properties.name: JobId
properties.help: The job Id to provide to coveralls.io. Default is <c>0</c>.

properties.name: ServiceName
properties.help: The service-name for the coverage report. Default is <c>coveralls.net</c>.

properties.name: PullRequest
properties.help: The github pull request id. Used for updating status on github PRs.
